experience.title: Project Manager
experience.description: Successfully leading a high stakes online Exams project for an NSW Government Educational body in addition to managing a registration project for a Victoria Government board. The online assessment app leverages Amazon Rekognition and AWS cloud services.â€¢ Ensuring successful delivery of exam project where all candidates are able to complete their exams and administrators are able to evaluate and publish resultsâ€¢ Liaison between customers, product team, exam squad and support team to ensure exam is delivered seamlessly, accurately, securely and on timeâ€¢	 Closely working with customer stakeholders for requirements and reviewing delivery team estimatesâ€¢ Leading the organizational initiative to migrate from Zoho projects to Jiraâ€¢	 Subject Matter Expertise for online assessment product including iAuthor, iExam, iProctor and registration modulesâ€¢ Facilitating Executive level review of projects across the organizationâ€¢ Owning the account financials including working with accounts team for timely invoicing and realisation of revenueâ€¢ Tracking the support tickets to closure prudently and managing the established SLA along with the support metrics report

The online assessment app leverages Amazon Rekognition and AWS cloud services.â€¢ Ensuring successful delivery of exam project where all candidates are able to complete their exams and administrators are able to evaluate and publish resultsâ€¢ Liaison between customers, product team, exam squad and support team to ensure exam is delivered seamlessly, accurately, securely and on timeâ€¢ Closely working with customer stakeholders for requirements and reviewing delivery team estimatesâ€¢ Leading the organizational initiative to migrate from Zoho projects to Jiraâ€¢ Subject Matter Expertise for online assessment product including iAuthor, iExam, iProctor and registration modulesâ€¢ Facilitating Executive level review of projects across the organizationâ€¢ Owning the account financials including working with accounts team for timely invoicing and realisation of revenueâ€¢ Tracking the support tickets to closure prudently and managing the established SLA along with the support metrics report

experience.title: Program Manager I
experience.description: Owning a Store Asset Management program that processes IOT telemetry data from assetsensors to identify anomalies, raise alarms for store associates to work on or createworkorders for technicians to fix assets using Azure cloud services. Program spans multiplecross disciplinary teams across geographies.â€¢ Completely owning the program end to end from planning, technical and functionalrequirements, design, development and delivery across teams seamlesslyâ€¢ Ensuring Program roadmap is updated and available for all relevant stakeholders. Alsoworking closely with teams to align their backlog with programâ€¢ Effectively tracking and communicating the program progress along with risks if anyâ€¢ Mitigating risks and issues with clear ownership and timeline to closureâ€¢ Resolving dependencies across teams via Scrum of Scrums and team connectsâ€¢ Leveraging reusable components across teams to expedite delivery of programcomponentsâ€¢ Coaching teams to be self-organized and facilitating scrum ceremonies like planning,scrum, review, retrospective, backlog grooming and helping remove impedimentsâ€¢ With deep techno functional understanding, have suggested innovative solutions

experience.title: Project Manager
experience.description: Successfully managing multiple teams for over 4 years, who work on Big Data technology stack leveraging AWS cloud services to build an innovative, resilient, high performing and elastic platform to perform Credit Bureau operations.â€¢	Ensuring high quality, on time Project delivery that results in customer happiness leading to more growth in the projectâ€¢	With strong knowledge of the business, collaborating and partnering with customers in demonstrating thought leadershipâ€¢	Simplified and streamlined invoicing process for timely realization of revenue by collaborating with Finance team and key stakeholdersâ€¢	Effective strategic planning, monitoring and cost control to achieve high Gross Margin â€¢	Building a passionate, cohesive and agile team that focuses on learning and sharing knowledge to be technically adeptâ€¢	Forecasting, Planning and Estimating appropriately for a healthy work life balance for team and effective control for optimal work deliveryâ€¢	Inspiring team to diligently comply to Process and adopt Engineering best practices including automation and optimization wherever possibleâ€¢	Efficiently mitigating risk, timely tactful communication with appropriate stakeholders and mentor team members for their growth
experience.description_html: Successfully managing multiple teams for over 4 years, who work on Big Data technology stack leveraging AWS cloud services to build an innovative, resilient, high performing and elastic platform to perform Credit Bureau operations.â€¢ Ensuring high quality, on time Project delivery that results in customer happiness leading to more growth in the projectâ€¢ With strong knowledge of the business, collaborating and partnering with customers in demonstrating thought leadershipâ€¢ Simplified and streamlined invoicing process for timely realization of revenue by collaborating with Finance team and key stakeholdersâ€¢ Effective strategic planning, monitoring and cost control to achieve high Gross Margin â€¢ Building a passionate, cohesive and agile team that focuses on learning and sharing knowledge to be technically adeptâ€¢ Forecasting, Planning and Estimating appropriately for a healthy work life balance for team and effective control for optimal work deliveryâ€¢ Inspiring team to diligently comply to Process and adopt Engineering best practices including automation and optimization wherever possibleâ€¢ Efficiently mitigating risk, timely tactful communication with appropriate stakeholders and mentor team members for their growth
